import pandas as pd 
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as px
from plotly.subplots import make_subplots
import seaborn as sns
source.d8229c61:
contgrp=df.groupby('Contract')['MonthlyCharges'].mean().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(contgrp, y="MonthlyCharges", x="Contract",color='Contract', log_y=False)
fig.update_layout(title='Monthly revenue from diffrent Cortract group')
fig.show()

source.6ec63f46:
intsrv=df['InternetService'].value_counts().reset_index()

#fig = make_subplots(rows=1, cols=2)
fig = px.pie(intsrv, values="InternetService", names="index",template="seaborn")

fig.update_traces(rotation=90, pull=0.05, textinfo="percent+label")
fig.show()
